name: Burning Hands
flavorText: You unleash a burst of ember-laced wind from your open hand. Creatures in a 20-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking full damage on a failed save or half on a success. The blast singes surfaces and can briefly light loose tinder.
description:
As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that arenâ€™t being worn or carried.
higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.
